note:
Been on the internet since before it was cool, and continue being uncool.

If yr into CryptoShite, don't bother following, you might as well be a Reply Guy.

Avatar is a red toy tractor, with a white roof. It has a blue background. Banner is a mural on a shop front in New Brighton - this shows a marine scene with what would presumably be a mermaid, and to the right a purple octopus.

The mural is by the Christchurch DTR Crew .
